title: Flat opening seen ahead of RBI meet outcome
description: Domestic markets expected to open flat as investors await RBI's monetary policy outcome amid mixed global sentiment and FPI outflows.
content: Domestic markets are likely to open on a flat note, as the focus will be on the RBI monetary policy meet outcome. Analysts expect RBI to maintain the status quo and the focus will be on its pronounce… [+3248 chars]
